description:
Companion app for e-bikes and components BikeBridge is a companion for your e-bike and components, built with privacy in mind. Features
  • See statistics (e.g. speed, total distance, gear) in real-time
  • See all raw data transmitted/received to/from bike
  • Send custom payloads
  • Change settings on bike
  • See bike info (e.g. serial number, MAC address, etc.)
  • HUD
Supported powertrains
  • Shimano
See documentation for full feature list BikeBridge only supports bikes/components that use Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)
